name: basic-project
description: Basic TypeScript Bun CLI project template

files.template:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2022",
    "module": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "allowImportingTsExtensions": true,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowJs": true,
    "checkJs": false,
    "strict": {{#if is_strict}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "noImplicitAny": {{#if is_strict}}true{{else}}false{{/if}},
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationMap": true,
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "rootDir": "./src"
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules", "dist"]
}

# Dependencies
node_modules/

# Build output
dist/
*.tsbuildinfo

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
